body:
Hey. I am Alex and used to be an active member of avicus. You may know me by the name of iznot4fun, YoUrFaCeHaHa and plenty of others because of name changes. I have been on here for 3 years (I think) and damn things have changed, I used to be playing walls all day but school has changed and I am doing pretty bad so I need to shape things up in grade 8. I never thought I was going to leave I love this server but I just can't stay active on here. I always thought I was an active user but no one knew me it seemed. I was here when the IP for walls was wallsmc.com and mc-hg.org was for hunger games. I also fell into the CS:GO trap and I may even quit that. (Steam is Atuism) Here is everyone I'd like to thank. (I am saying there old usernames because I can't keep track of all of the names)

ebirdy9: We've known eachother for 2 and a half years and for a year and a half we would always talk and have plenty of fun. It was sad after the fountain incident.

clockracer: Omai we only met about a year or so ago but you are the nicest person here. You are so fun to talk with, you never get mad. Please talk to me still.

jakesandobal: You feel like my long lost older brother. No matter what happens you are always there to protect me, we have been through a few tough times but I am glad we're over it.

Cacalmarin: You guys all had something special and unique that was just made my mincraft experience so much better. Flooding messages  every night through my skype. Wont forget you guys<3

Tynvale: We never talked a lot but when you do its a fun time keep my skype so I can message you when you get a million subscirbers.

Petlas: Ayyy really fun person to talk to but timezones keeps me from messaging you :cc

Can't think of anymore. I still may be in scrims every once in a while and I'll be checking the forums. My skype is ItzMeRekt  

I will probably be back at the end of the school year. Thank you everyone.

title: 3 years

replies.body: Shame to see ya go, Alex! I hope things go well in Year 8 for you!
replies.body_tagged: Shame to see ya go, Alex! I hope things go well in Year 8 for you!

replies.body:
Lets go back to the start. When I first met I thought you were a little shit and even though we didnt talk much/play together much, I realised I'd judged you too quickly and that you were actually pretty cool. I hoped you enjoyed and learnt something from your time at cacalmarin

Have fun with life man, Cacal is here for you anytime, you have my skype feel free to msg me anytime. And if you are struggling at school I can always try and help you in whatever subject you might feel challenged by
